tab1.text1:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
<Richcolor Color="1, 0, 0, 1">			PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU READ AND FULLY UNDERSTAND THE RULES BEFORE PLAYING AS IGNORANCE IS NOT AN EXCUSE !</>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- NO Cheating/hacking or use of map glitches/bots/macros
- NO Unnecessary toxicity/racism/homophobia
- Player/tribe names such as human, mens, mensch, survivor, numbers or simply offensive/disturbing names are <Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">FORBIDDEN</>
- <Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">One base per player/tribe.</> Please keep your builds reasonable in size!
   Maximum <Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">tek forcefield 2</> radius and maximum 2 ASR Behemoth gates/walls stacking.
   <Richcolor Color="1, 0, 0, 1">ELSE ALL YOUR STRUCTURES WILL BE DELETED!</>
- Players <Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">MUST!</> remove any taming pens and temporary bases once finished with them
- NO Blocking artifacts/Obelisks/caves/rich or unique resources locations or spawn player locations
-<Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1"> DO NOT Grief or build too close to another player</>
- <Richcolor Color="1, 0, 0, 1">Trading or giving</> people free stuff/dinos is <Richcolor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">NOT ALLOWED</> (it also applies to those who receive it)
- Maximum 10 dinos out ! For the rest of your dinos please use SCS Terminal !
- Any dinos outside bases or unclaimed/in wandering/aggressive mode on the map will be cryopoded or destroyed!
- NO Offline auto-breeding. use SCS Terminal (terminal settings -> auto trap babies)
- NO Structure spamming (foundations, pillars etc.) or "claiming" land
- Knocked out dinos should be either tamed or be killed. Don't leave them knocked out all over the place !
-<Richcolor Color="1, 0, 0, 1"> ONLY ENGLISH IN GLOBAL CHAT!</> If you need to speak another language do so in Tribe or Local chat ONLY!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
<Richcolor Color="1, 0, 0, 1">																	  BREAKING THE RULES WILL RESULT IN A PERMANENT BAN (WITHOUT WARNING) !</>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

<Richcolor color="0, 1, 0, 1"> Please make sure you check back regularly to assure you're in the current with any new changes made to the rules [Default = F1] !</>
<Richcolor Color="0, 1, 0, 1"> These rules could change with or without notice to you !</>

tab2.text1:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	Map: Astraeos
	Mode: PvE
	The irrigation pipe-intake doesn't need water (place it anywhere)
	Unlock all engrams (no TEK): Instant Automatic
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">SHOP</> - in your inventory, the small house - bottom left (players earn 100 points every 30 minutes)
	Teleporters will get the player's stuff back from their corpse - <RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">ONLY</> if they have Awesome Teleporter Remote in their inventory
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	Max levels:
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- player:</> 175
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- wild dinos:</> 1200
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- max tamed dino levelups:</> +100
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	Structures limits (per player/tribe):
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- alfa platforms (oceanic):</> 4
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- large crop plot:</> 20
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- k rustic crop plot:</> 10
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- tek crop plot:</> 10
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- ultimate tek crop plot:</> 1
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- tek forcefield (normal or version 2):</> 1
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- teleporters:</> 10
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">- max. structures in range:</> 3000 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">																												THE SERVER RESTARTS EVERYDAY AT 04.00 (CET)</>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
